name: The Wolf Among Us

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Telltale Games/The Wolf Among Us/The Wolf Among Us.exe

files.game: N/A:Please select the Telletale (Download Center) Windows installer.

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the Telletale (Download Center) Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Telltale Games/The Wolf Among Us/The Wolf Among Us.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: sandbox
    description: Disabling unused WINE features
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
